App string resources including name, titles, and package identifiers.

frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the WordHuntScreen inside a full‑height container.
frontend/src/components/game/DifficultyS: Placeholder component file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/game/GameControl: React component rendering progress, timer, and time‑limit inputs for game control.
Renders the interactive letter grid, handling pointer selection and highlighting found or selected cells.
frontend/src/components/game/WordHuntScr: Main game screen that initializes game state, renders controls, grid, and word list, and manages timing and new games.
frontend/src/components/game/WordList.ts: Displays the list of words to find, sorted with found words marked and styled.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identity and offering login and logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useWordHuntGame.ts: Manages word hunt gameplay state, including puzzle generation, selection logic, found words, and countdown timer.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/wordhunt/duration.ts: Utility functions for converting, validating, and clamping countdown timer durations.
frontend/src/lib/wordhunt/generator.ts: Generates a word-hunt puzzle by placing words on a grid in random directions and filling remaining cells with random letters.
frontend/src/lib/wordhunt/selection.ts: Computes selected grid cells, derives the selected word, and validates it against remaining words.
frontend/src/lib/wordhunt/time.ts: Formats a seconds value into a MM:SS string with clamping at zero.
frontend/src/lib/wordhunt/words.ts: Exports the full automotive-themed word list used for puzzle generation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, sets up providers, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and state persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme extensions, plugins, colors, and animations for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, versioned state, architectural notes, and tracked feature requirements.
